MarkdownCodeBlock.code_block: <appSettings> <add key="MediaServicesAccountName" value="Media-Services-Account-Name"/> <add key="MediaServicesAccountKey" value="Media-Services-Account-Key"/> <add key="MediaServicesStorageAccountName" value="Media-Services-Storage-Account-Name"/> <add key="MediaServicesStorageAccountKey" value="Media-Services-Storage-Account-Key"/> <add key="ExternalStorageAccountName" value="External-Storage-Account-Name"/> <add key="ExternalStorageAccountKey" value="External-Storage-Account-Key"/> </appSettings>
